"And got tangled in my hair and taken for a ride?" She finishes. You nod. "Hmm....well, I guess your evening didn't go very swimmingly, eh?" She chuckles at her pun, and you laugh along with her. This HAD been a pretty bad night so far, after all.

It was then that her booming footsteps stopped. "Ah, this looks good. My favorite chair."

You're just about to ask what she means when the hippo lady suddenly lowers her hand towards the wide metal chair, and drops you onto its cushioned seat.
She made the drop a short one, but you still land on your back...as a shadow suddenly covers you.

You look up--and yelp in terror. A familiar building-sized, bikini-clad rump loomed over you; plump enough to cover the entire plush cushion you'd been dropped onto. The hippo lady looks over her shoulder and gives a seductive grin.
"Like the view, little one? I hope so, because you're in for a VERY close look." Her knees bend, and her gargantuan booty begins to slowly descend.

You scramble back, but even at the edge of the cushion you'd still end up flattened; and you couldn't bring yourself to jump off the chair. "N-NO! STOP! PLEASE, NOT LIKE THIS!!" You plead, futilely holding up your arms to block the oncoming fleshy orbs. "THIS IS UNDIGNIFIED!!"

The hippo woman's butt stops its descent an arm's length away from your from, and you hear her sigh. "Oh, don't be so dramatic. I know how to sit on humans without killing them with my big, beautiful behind--" She wiggles said backside and giggles a bit; '--so you won't get crushed to death, just a little squished. Like I said, I'm not some monster. I just haven't seen a human around in AGES, and this was always my favorite way of playing with them. You might even like it! Oh, and try not to scream when my cheeks come down, you'll get an open mouth full of bum that way."

Your cry of protest is ignored as she promptly lands her big rear on you, flattening you into the cushion. And just like she'd warned, you get an open mouth full of spandex and hippo flab. The taste of sweat, chlorinated water and spandex almost makes you gag; even as the animal giantess' impossible weight painfully pins you down. You can't move beyond pitiful twitches and struggling, and all you see is the print of her bikini. Everything hurts....but miraculously, no bones were broken and you weren't smashed into paste.

Above, you hear the hippo woman release a blissful, throaty sigh. "Ohhh...that feels lovely. Just the feeling of that little lump in the cushion...the first few twitches...."

You blush despite your pain and confusion. The hippo woman was getting aroused by this?! Pancaking people under her big ass was how she got off? Being eaten didn't sound so bad now; at least that wasn't as humiliating as being a pleasure object for some giant chick with jacked-up hormonal glands!

"Mmmm...." Your captress purrs. After shaking off her ecstacy, she calls out to you, "Alright little gentleman, I'm almost finished. Just a warning; this part gets a little rough."

With that, she begins to slowly twist and grind her massive behind on the cushion, the sheer weight dragging your arms and legs side to side with the crushing mass. Even your still-open jaw gets involuntarily waggled, due to the mouthful of hippo-butt you'd gotten when she'd first sat down. And throughout, you could hear her laughing and sighing with bliss as she toyed with you....

It was ten minutes before the grinding stopped, the hippo lady giving one last satisfied breath. Her butt pressed down on you a little harder, meaning she was likely leaning back in glee. "After sooo long...almost forgot what that feels like." She cleared her throat, wiggling down on you one last time for good measure. "I think that's enough for tonight, little one. I'm sorry about that, but I just couldn't resist after so long without seeing a human around here. And for what it's worth...you made a fantastic little seat cushion. And such a gentleman, too!"

As the gargantuan booty FINALLY begins to lift....

11133221113.content:
Winking at you, the bikini-clad pachyderm keeps tracing a plump finger along the page, mumbling too low for you to hear. Her already cheerful expression brightens further when she reaches what she’s apparently looking for. “A-ha! There it is!” She chirps, floating the book back onto the shelf. “This should be fun! Haven’t used this spell in a while.”

“What kind of spell?” You ask, trying not to gulp. The last time she got nostalgic, you ended up squished under a mountain of hippo rump.

She winks at you again, already waving her hands in slow, deliberate patterns. “You’ll see, little one. Oh, and you might want to sit down. This one’s a bit of a doozy.”

A blue glow starts shining from her hands as her gestures speed up; first low, then slowly building up. She starts chanting in a gibberish language, her voice becoming distorted and rumbling.

Soon her hands are a blur, the glow blinding, and her voice a roar.

The room seems to shake, stretch, and spin all at once. You feel hot, then cold; like you’re falling, then floating; everything becomes a blur—

And then all at once, everything snaps back to normal.

You stagger and faceplant on the giant bed, your head spinning and spots dancing in your vision; like a hangover from hell. What had that hippo woman just done?

“I told you you should sit down,” a familiar voice scolds.

You lift your head up--to find your pachyderm captress is gone.
“What the--?”

“Over here, sweetie.” She says from behind. You spin around….and find her human-sized, standing on the bed.

Your jaw drops, and she giggles. “Surprised? I figured I’d be less intimidating like this. Or do you prefer me like I normally am?”

Faster than you could blink, she was huge again and looming over you with a smirk. There wasn’t a wave of her hand or a magic glow. Just an instant change, like cheap trick photography.

“H-how…?”

“Or would you like a change of scenery?” She asks, grinning. With a blink, you had left her bright yellow bedroom and were at a sandy beach…in broad daylight. Salt air and the sound of waves hit you, and you scramble back on the sand---which suddenly turns back into a blanket as you find the two of you back in her room. Smiling, the hippo-witch picks you up and holds you in her giant hand, close to her face.

“Impressed?”

You nod dumbly, and ask the obvious question:. “What…what WAS all that?”

“Pocket dimension spell. Makes this room my—well, OUR—little corner of the universe. Lets me twist reality all around. No illusions, it’s all real. If I want to be a different size, I just have to think it, and it’s true. If I want to be at a beach, I can do that too. Almost anything I want; bam, mine. I just have to imagine it.”

You gape. This giant hippo wasn’t just a sorceress, she was practically a goddess.

Her smile suddenly drops. She sighs, the gust nearly knocking you over, and drops you back on the bed. “Takes a ton of magic to do it, though. I’m stuck to minor spells for WEEKS after using it for even a little bit. Overdid it once and was powerless for a month. And it’s not much fun without…well, a playmate.”

You gulp. That didn’t sound good.
“…Playmate? As in, me?”

She nods. “That’s right. I can dream up people, but they’re…predictable. They’re part of the spell, so they all come from here—” she tapped her head, “—and don’t do much I don’t think up. Not much fun in that. And most people kinda find me scary...” She frowns, but leans in and smiles. “But you? Well, like I said; I haven’t seen a human around here in ages. And I’ve NEVER played with one in my pocket dimension, so…why not try it? Don’t worry; I wouldn’t think of hurting you; I always will it so everything is harmless, even when I, heh; play rough. Remember how you didn’t get squished too bad when I sat on you?”

“All too well…” You mumble.

She giggles. “Hmph. Spoilsport. Anyway, if it gets too scary or intense I can always kill the spell and return things to normal. It’s all in good fun.” She leaned down and cuddled her cheek against you. “And, even if you don’t want to do it, I’ll let you stay here regardless. You’re a guest, not a toy.”

It took a moment to realize she was asking for permission. Powerful as she was, she wasn’t going to force this on you. She was even taking you in—in this world of giant monster women, a roof over your head could be lifesaving.

You extend a hand. “…Alright. I’ll do it. Just...just please don’t sit on me again, okay?”

In a blink, she’s human-sized again, and shakes your hand. “Deal. And don’t worry; I won’t be doing that again for a while. I just had to get it out of my system—like I said, I hadn’t seen a human in ages…I just couldn’t control myself.”

You chuckle. “As long as you give me a warning. And the view wasn’t too bad, now that I think of it.”

“Don’t tempt me,” she warns. Then she smiles.“Oh, and where are my manners? My name’s Morgan, what’s yours?”

You give your name—and mid-word, Morgan is huge again. She snatches you up between two fingers, light playing off her glasses.

“This is gonna be so much fun...I have a great game in mind, little guy!"

Well, whatever you can still call “real,” anyways. You move your foot, and the course of action infuses energy to your body like it were breathing life into you; your eyes ache, your limbs are shivering, and your tiredly rub your eyes to relieve them of the glaring sources of light sitting overhead; at last, it seems like everything that’d happened before, Morgan, her magic, being sat on her was an ended dream, and you were finally waking back up to everything you knew as true and dear.

That is, if you’d fallen asleep at a wrestling ring. In a patriotic spandex uniform.

The “audience” (just rows and rows of dark-colored blobs, merging and squishing against one another to substitute crowds of people fighting one another for space) all converge into a roaring ovation as a certain set of legs steps into the light from the nigh pitch-black surrounding the ring; wide, awkward hooves swallowed by grotesquely bloated calves that seem to get wider and wider the more their owner trundles into the opposite end of the playing field, till Morgan is completely in the light.

A black mask covers her entire face, her eyes whited out in a way semblance to a super hero in a cartoon. She thrusts her arms up to the air and rotates to fully embrace her roaring fans.

Then Morgan jumps.

No...no, she doesn’t jump. She merely flicks at the floor with her toes and catapults twice her height into the air, twirling around in the air before she floats in front of one of the lights shining down on the stadium, a silhouette of her body bracing for impact forming an eclipse that would’ve almost resembled a superhero’s logo, and truly, at the sight, the fear of getting flattened beneath her plummeting body was thrust deep into your heart.

Time goes even slower. The distance between you halves, and then halves again, and right as the world is shifting to black, you realize you’d never stopped screaming like a girl.

WHMPT

...the sound impacts your ears like every occurring sound during a meteorite impacting a city, the full magnitude of the explosion, buildings toppling, and all the screams compressed together into a a fraction of a second. Then it’s silent. Even the blood traveling in your ears is gone.

It’s dark, even more black then shutting your eyes in a dark room. You try to move a finger, wherever they are, seeing as you can’t even feel your own head. There’s no pain, but no pleasure. No heat, cold, weight or air...

Gone.

Just gone.

...but then a loud schlup fills your ears as air travels back into purgatory, Morgan giving a grunt of satisfaction as she rolls of your body. The cheering returns, but you stare at the ceiling, processing what happened. You’re still alive, there’s that, but that only means you have the pleasure of seeing what’s happened to your bloody, imagining what all the bloody details would be.

Bracing yourself for the horror film you were about to witness, you tilt your head forward to observe yourself, but you jolt upwards in shock at the sheer lack{/} of being a bloody, bony puddle from the waist down. You push up with your unbroken arms, peeling from the layer of hippo sweat gluing you to the ring, and numbly run your hands down your chest and legs, devoid of anything less than a bruise. Hell, you’re not even mentally traumatized, if just having trouble accustoming to the fact that you’d survive vied being flattened by a fat, Amazonian hippo.]

Speaking of, a warm giggle comes from your side, and you see Morgan having a laugh near your side, arms folded underneath her breasts and her massive legs playfully kicking about, splayed like she were a lover waiting for you in bed.

“How’s two out of three sound?” She offers.

“Well, folks, it looks like Johnny McPunchface’s little second wind has brought this match to a tie!” The announcer’s voice resounds once again, our fans mixing into an array of joyous cheers and petty booing at the news. “...and there’s only one way for a tie to be settled in the ring, so for any members expecting them to shake hands, I suggest you walk away!”

Then the ceiling rumbles. You and Morgan look upwards, the sounds of a large, groaning mechanism lurching somewhere above as four metal walls descend from between the light fixtures, their ends meeting and clamping together to form a cage. Whilst her maw remains masked, you have a gut instinct by the white silhouettes of her eyes that she seems a little too pleased by this change as she cracks her doughy fingers and wrings her head to the side, proving bones still exist in that fat neck-tyre of hers with a loud pop. You stay in character and throw a few mock punches into the air, unleashing a few amateur kung-fu poses to rile up the crowd, but your inner sense pride tells you it’s not nearly as intimidating as she could be just by standing still.

Then motors begin spinning in the ground as well. You leap back as a panel beneath your feet shifts downwards and pulls over to the side, enabling a metallic rack to rise up from below. The same happens for Morgan, who itches at her double-chin at the selections that were laid out for her inside.

You check your own arsenal; one’s a katana, its blade wrapped in an undying sheathe of red flame. The next is a jet pack, but its rocket pack is also accompanied by a tank of green fluid affixed to its back that is connected to a manual hose, its tip leaking a noxious gas of the same color. All tempting choices, but, ever the gamer to go the energy-weapon route to fry your enemies to a crisp, one item catches your eye the most; that is, mainly the glow of yellow light burning from within. A pair of iron wristbands adjourned with lightning symbols, semblant to the shells of batteries with their maws wide open, silently screaming for an owner.

At another gut instinct, you thrust your hands in, the metal shells clamping down on your arms. Your hairs stand on end as sparks of electricity buzz within the tips of the gloves, which traverses into your arms, making your every pore and muscle tingle by an influx of static pooling in the air, black rubber oozing out from the gloves’ openings and covering your hands like a proper set of gloves, completed by a pair of buttons that shoot out and rest in the center of either palm.

The buttons both glow red and, shedding any care for the consequences, you press either with the middle fingers of both hands. With little acknowledgement worse than getting shocked by a doorknob, you’re encased by a cocoon of lightning bolts that swarms the metal rack like a plate of glowing white snakes, sparks emitting from the jet suit and fizzling its rockets before the shelf lowers once again, the floor sealing itself to how it was before.

As does Morgan’s, who’s equipping herself with a tank on her back with wires that connect to white sleeves that she’s stuffing her doughy arms into. There isn’t the curiosity and wonder you’re holding in right now: she knows exactly what it does, and her cheeks are wide with an invisible grin as she turns a switch on one of her wristbands, inviting glowing blue liquid to travel through the tubes and into her bloodstream.

Her veins shine as the liquid makes its way though her body, enabling you to see the quest it takes through her arms and into her chest...as well as the effect it leaves wherever it moves. Her mask stretches to accommodate her bloating jowls whilst they spread along her spare chin, which fattened to give space for another birthing its way from under her jaw, followed by {i]another after that; she emits an enjoyed grunt whilst cupping her palms around the expanding curvature of her breasts, satisfied by an extra few handful’s worth of titfat that’s still growing in their grasp, then maneuvers her hands downwards to feel the widening curves of her belly, growing heavier and larger whilst merging with the immense width of her legs, briefly supplying her with the proper roundness of a sumo wrestler’s build...

...then comes her favorite part, judging by the pleased howl she releases as her behind grows to compete, her entire lower half rapidly widening out and bloating up to seize its former dominance on her figure, and then beyond. Her panties ride up against the extreme influx of size to the legs they were containing, so much of the gargantuan globes of her rump pushing their way through that it brings into question if she’d have enough decency in a proper match. Coupled with her extra-fattening figure is the fact that she’s growing up as well, initially at only a slow enough pace to notice, but it really picks up as the glow in her veins touches her feet, forcing every part of her between her toes and her hair to grow, soon ascending an extra half of her fight with a much, much more tremendous figure to spare.

Her black skin adds a nightly tint to her growing shadow, which soon overtakes you as her shoulders grow past the lights, but throwing a punch to the floor gives you all the light you need, timing a button press so the floor lights up with a circle of energy that surrounds you, filled with stray bolts of lightning that painlessly burrow through your body and singe the floor. Morgan ascends to fifty feet. Then sixty feet. Then seventy feet, her body fattening to such frighteningly fat proportions that her asscheeks each outsize and outweigh her entire form but seconds ago. The distance between your eyes and hers increasing, she arches down, belly and boobs squashing against the ground and forcing her to stretch to smack a fist down with a glare as she continues to grow, her extending height surpassed behind by the growth of her utterly cyclopian butt as either half tower over her back rolls like a pair of otherworldly monoliths that are budding into the sky to consume the planet, outsizing all that humanity knew existed...

...then her eyes widen at the sound of metal warping, and she stares up past her shoulder as her behind fills the entire space between the cage’s walls, black pachyderm blubber bending the bars and railing out of place. Sheepishly, she claps her hands, and the entire cage swells to dozens of times its size, supplying her plenty of legroom.

“Three! Two! One!” The announcer counts off. “FIGHT!!!”

Ding! Ding! Ding!

You ball your fists, thus clenching the buttons and preparing crude whips of lightning that flutter from your hands, prepped to fight back when Morgan inevitably gives charge to flatten you again...but she stays put. Forgetting how much of a head start she has, she instead straightens out and stomps forward, a slow, lethargic feat that just watching makes you feel like your own legs are caught in cement. Nothing. You throw your whips back and forth, striking her in her extra-sized belly a few times, but she only scratches at her singed leotard without losing her steadily growing pace, at which point it’s very, very apparent how close she’s getting. You pull your hands behind your back and shoot them forward, firing a slew of lightning bolts at her body that her dimply hide accepts with no problem.

It’s when she’s a single stomp away from reaching you that you give up on the light show and run the other way. Running away proves itself a temporary choice; you guess it requires Morgan just two steps to catch up to you now, but on a whim, you press the switches and throw the resultant sparks at your feet, and achieve the exact thing you need right now: speed. Your legs paddle on beams of lightning at speeds your thinly-muscled legs wouldn’t achieve a tenth of in the real world, and even time itself seems to blur whilst you remain at a frantic space, white light bordering the very rim of your eyes. You look back, eager to mock Morgan as she stumbles to catch up with you...but you instead see her leap in long, powerful bounds that do a decent enough job. At the speed of flowing molasses, she performs another leap and spins through the air, the spanning view of her ass providing a brief comfort to her fist coming around and barreling right to you, the sight of her clenched, meaty fingers soaring your way prompting a shriek from your lungs before you throw your hands over your head, only able to hope that not seeing what was to follow would lessen the pain. Morgan’s fist meets the face of your gauntlets, providing your face with but an inch-thick strip of metal to guard your body with the sheer tonnage and velocity of her punch...

...and it works.

You feel your gloves dig into the supple flesh of her hand, but anything further than that delivers as much force as a runaway shopping cart. Looking past the crux of your arms, Morgan’s eyes are also bugging as she tries to exert more force onto her arm, even grabbing it with her other to aid in pushing it upon you, but sparks of electricity fizzle through her muscles that prevent her from play-smashing your body into non-bloody pudding. Her struggles renders you just as moot to battling any further, but at a quick glance on your own gauntlets, the yellow symbols are gradually turning white, siphoning the power in her limbs into your own source of energy.

You shut your eyes, mellowing out your face...then deliver a punch that, amongst a resounding explosion of energy, knocks her fist aside. Her legs slip out from beneath her, a letting out a startled yelp as she flies out of balance.

“Gotcha.”

CRACK!!!

Then you soar upwards on the speed and path of a lightning bolt as thick as a bus, the ensuing roar mixed with the clap of thunder and the impact of your fist striking her jaw.
11133221113211.title: No, officer, I hadn’t seen Sha-zam! Today.

choices: Morgan makes a bath for you in the sink
She has second thoughts, and wants to try the "other" option...
111332211132111.content:
Your punch’s thunderclap is still ringing in your ears as Morgan’s head jerks back from the impact, her eyes going wide in (literal) shock—the look on her face was priceless: the giant werehippo couldn’t believe you’d actually scored a hit! She staggers back, drunkenly swaying as stray flickers of lightning dance across her blimp-like body.

Her snout fills your view as she focuses on you hovering before her at eye-level, a bewildered look on her face. She wobbles in place, slurring. “Wha…I didn’t know it could—YIPE!”

Taking the opening, you zoom at her and deliver a haymaker to her nose, calling forth another burst of lightning! Current shoots through Morgan and she spasms and jitters uncontrollably, her muscles thrashing from the shock. The entire stadium shakes with a staggering step back, a crater forming in the floor. “Guess this news is a SHOCK, Morgan! You should keep up with CURRENT events!” you taunt, posing for the crowd.

Groans at your horrible pun mingle with cheers at your light show. You eat it up, striking some more poses.

…And barely dodge Morgan’s swatting hand, the wind it leaves in its wake knocking you briefly astray. It sounds like a freight train zooming by.

Morgan’s blimb-shaped-and-sized body crackles with stray current as she again stumbles, her massive booty slamming into the cage’s wall, bending the metal out. She retakes a stance, but the pachyderm giantess is unsteady on her feet, blinking in confusion. But she’s recovering, and a glance at your gauntlets shows the glow dimming—these things didn’t have much of a charge, apparently.

This was it. Time for the coup de grace!

You tap your fists together, coating them in lightning. Your hair stands on end, the air around you seems to vibrate. Even the stage lights above the ring flicker, as if you’re drawing away their power.

And Morgan…stares wide eyed and slack-jawed.

With a roar, you zoom at her, cocking back your fist. And deliver one last quip.

“TAKE THIS! MY RAGE, MY FEAR, ALL MY POWER! SEARING! STORM! FIST”

You land a punch square on her massive distended belly. It caves in like a marshmallow, and ALL of the lightning shoots into her at once. The gloves power down and you fall to the floor—

And you’re forced to cover your ears as a massive explosion envelopes the ring. The audience screams—in fear, not approval. Morgan’s devices spark and explode into dust as a storm of power shoots up, her form thrashing even worse than before….

And then the storm clears. Morgan is now holding her gut, her costume covered in burns and crackling with current. She tries to stand up…

and slips.

Morgan lets out a startled, rather squeaky yelp nothing like her seductive contralto. Her feet slip out from under her, and she tumbles backward. Her titanic butt slams against the cage wall, bursting the metal open like it was wet cardboard. The crowd behind her are enveloped in the shadow of her all-encompassing booty, and they barely get time to scream before her cheeks crush down on them with meteoric force. Those out of the impact zone fare not better, for a massive shockwave is sent out, obliterating everything in its path. Half the arena—and the crowd—were wiped out in an instant.

Morgan tries to rise…but slumps back down, flat on her back.

All is silent…all is still.
For a few seconds, of course.

*DING-DING-DING!!!*

“IT’S OVER! IT’S OVER! MORGAN IS DOWN, LADIES AND GENTS! GIVE IT UP FOR OUR NEW CHAMPION!” the announcer bellows, voice cracking.

The cheer that follows is even more deafening than Morgan’s fall. Joyous wails assault your eardrums, and you rasie your fist in victory.

This was amazing, the thrill of the crowd; the adoration and adrenaline!

…And then, in an instant, it collapses.
The arena seems to stretch and wave, and in a blink you’re back on Morgan’s bed. Your weapons are gone. Sweat drenches you. You’re exhausted.

Morgan is flat on her back, panting and fanning herself with a look of exhausted bliss on her face.

“That. Was. Incredible…” she breaths, winded. She looks at you, grinning. “You were amazing, sweetie. Absolutely amazing.” Her plump hand suddenly grabs you and lifts you to her face…toward her mouth. You try to object, but it’s cut off when Morgan kisses you.

With her being 1500 feet tall, her lips all but enveloped you from head to toe. It’s a long kiss, almost smothering—and then she pulls you away from her lips with a deafening *SMACK!* and holds you close to her face.

“I haven’t had that much fun in ages…you beat me in my own little spell. You’re a special one, little human. I like you.” She nuzzles her massive snout against you, purring softly. “So cute…so adorable...”

“Th-thanks,” you pant, feeling yourself blush. For a gigantic animal woman, Morgan was a PHENOMENAL kisser. “You’re amazing too. Didn’t see that wrestling match coming. So, uh; what now?”

“Now we clean up,” Morgan answers. “Like I said, that spell drains a LOT of magic, so I can’t just zap us clean.” She snaps her fingers, calling up a wimpy sparkle that quickly fades. She looks at it with distaste, then gently stuffs you between her breats as she gets up. “So…it’s bathtime, then
We go to bed.”

Your eyes go wide. Bath time…?

“Uh, Morgan? D-do you mean we’re gonna…?”

She opens a door into a bathroom big enough to house an airport. An entire wall is dominated by a pink marble counter and GOLDEN sink, and a huge mirror. A chandelier provides light. The bathtub was enormous even by Morgan’s standards, made of marble. Plush rugs cover the floor, pretty-scented candles burning on a shelf.

Good Lord, this place was like a luxury hotel!

“Bathe TOGETHER?” Morgan finishes, chuckling. Her breasts bounce with her laughter. “Sweetie, I may like flattening humans under my big beautiful booty, but I’m not THAT kinky. Besides, it’d be dangerous for you! Nah, you’ll just wash up in my sink. Much safer that way.”

You sigh in relief…and some shameful disappointment. “Oh, good…” you mumble.
111332211132111.title: Morgan Meets Her Match

choices: Giddy, excited to meet a brand-new species!
Welcoming, if quite a bit bashful...
Mischievous, and noticing your fear, she turns the water back on, growing more!
1113322111321111.content:
...but all being said, as a human in a giant’s world who was welcomed with not only the unsolicited generosity of a titan that could’ve let you stay out in the cold as an act of mercy, but also wasted her extended use of her supernatural prowess just to give you a night of fun, you’re aware that her having a little privacy is just the start of your debt towards her, and you bite back any disappointment as she twists the handle to the sink, testing the steaming water with her finger.

Satisfied that it’s a safe temperature, Morgan scrunches her eyes up, her other hand’s fingers joining together to perform a snap. Her muzzle scrunches with concentration twice the intensity of what it took to perform her brain-bending spell from before, but all she has left of her magic is a few little pink electric sparks that snake around the flesh of her arm. Her fingers tense up, she snaps...and a flash and a bang ensues that bathes you in white smoke, a sudden draft encompassing you when your clothes disintegrated, in their place a swimsuit.

Tiny the spell may have been, Morgan takes some long, winded breaths as she sets you down in the sink, the golden basin’s unscalable walls robbing you the temptation of seeing Morgan undress as she trudges out of view, breathing heavily as she prepares her own shower. “Need anything, just holler!”

“Thanks!” You call back, trudging through the water that pools before it can hit the drain. Speaking of, in a twinge of concern, you wade towards the stream of water yourself to see how easy it’d be for you to get sucked away but the drainpipe is thankfully blocked by thick metal bars that allow the water to pass with no risk of you falling in, and observing the tree-trunk thick pillar of water, you test the flow with your head and proceed with scrubbing yourself clean.

Even the water feels expensive, purging the dirt from your pores at the mere contact with your skin, even moisturizing your hands’ dry skin. It’s just an average shower’s length till you’re the most clean you’ve ever been since the doctors first wiped you off after being born, but you keep wiping your arms, legs, every nook and cranny with twice the care you’d take on cleaning yourself for even the fanciest of nights, wanting every patch of skin on you to feel rejuvenated.

Then comes the obvious question: how does it taste? It may be magical on the skin, but that’s not to say anything magical is safe to consume. However, it’s not like Morgan would dare risk anything to hurt her new little playmate, so after regrettably pulling away from the waterfall, you give into curiosity. You cup your hands, easing it in to scoop some of the life-giving fluid to sample...

Then the stream thins out into nothing, the splashing at your feet muting to allow Morgan’s shower and some, to put it kindly, horrible singing you’d ask from a reality-bending mystic.

“Morgan?” You call out, pulling a few wet locks of hair from your eyes. “I think something’s going on with the wa...”

Then your voice snags, seeing why the water had stopped falling into the sink. The faucet is still running; it’s not even clogged. The water is just pooling in mid-air around its mouth in a growing sphere, a current swirling around that swishes some air bubbles inside through a whirlpool. With the water at your feet allowed to be sucked away into the drain, you unconsciously step backwards as the mass of water grows to what would be eight feet to your diminutive perspective, but its globular shape is disturbed by a point forming on one side that extends into a tentacle, which whips out onto the faucet’s handle to increase its flow.

As the sink is rapidly filled with water, all of it one with the same bizarre conglomeration, you leap back in fear and tread as far up the sink’s walls as you can without slipping, but that doesn’t stop you from paddling in a desperate attempt to climb as the blob ascends to twenty feet in height. “Morgan?! Morgan!!!”

Sadly, Morgan’s reaching a solo that leads to her screeching out words in a high pitch that reduces them to horrendous gibberish, and everything plays out with no interruption. The tentacle, much more plump with the growing mass of its host, withdraws, dropping to the mass’ side into a limb that’s significantly fatter and heavier in its unstretched length, but another ‘arm’ forms on its other ‘shoulder’ just as blobby as the first. In fact, the entire body of water is taking a shape; if still a gigantic, swelling spheroid, a ridge forms along its equator that resembles a fat belly roll, but its current also flows into its flanks, concentrating the mass to form into an expansive rear that pushes its hips into view from either side of its curvature.

By then, scrambling to escape the sink and screaming ‘Morgan!’ on repeat is second nature, feeling the massive collection of water grow to pool around your feet, but its wide-ways growth is soon matched as its owner to grow up as well, and its upper hemisphere blossoms with two breast-like hills that expands along the stomach’s roof till it covers its...really her, you can tell, belly’s roof like a muffin’s top. All that remains is a head, a globule forming on top with ‘flabby’ cheeks forming as the mountain of water becomes tall enough for her head to submerge the faucet’s pipe where her nose and mouth would be, but lacked such as it pulls away and shuts off the flow, her face consisted only of two large, glowing ovals decorated by sharp lashes at the ends.

Now fifty feet tall, the sapient lake styles the water along its head to form a floating cascade that drapes over it shoulder like a curled ribbon, her glowing eyes shutting in satisfaction as she courses her hands down the horizon of her spheric belly, working the kinks from its arms.

“MORGAN!!!” Comes a particularly loud screech out of you, earning a jolt from the super-sized water creature, its eyes shooting open in surprise. At last, Morgan’s shower turns off, and the top of her head pops into view.

“Yes?” She asks, fear clear in her voice.

Absent of any words or magic know how to warn her of what’s happening, you dumbly gesture at the water-demon. “That!!!”

A pause, which the water-creature spends eyeing you uncomfortably, but Morgan responds with a casual chuckle.

“Oh, that?” She dismisses. “Sorry, I forgot to mention. The water supply here is populated by water elementals.”

“Water...elementals?” You repeat in a numb tone.

“But listen, don’t worry none. They’re incredibly friendly!”

...and with no further word, instruction, or warning, Morgan turns her shower back on, her screeching lyrics presuming. Left alone and curled up against the slope of the sink, you just lock eyes with the water elemental, who tilts closer in interest, and you just manage a tiny wave of your hand and a shy smile. “...Hi?”

At the lack of any hostility, the water elemental’s eyes turn...
1113322111321111.title: Morgan makes a bath for you in the sink

choices: The elemental sits her big watery rump on you!
She plays aquatic tennis...with YOU as the ball!"
She turns on the faucet to get bigger!
11133221113211113.content:
The elemental’s expression lights up, like a little kid seeing their best friend on the playground. She taps a rippling hand to her mouthless face and swished a downward curve where a mouth would be, sketching in full, luscious lips.

It took you a second to process that the creature just drew a smile on her face. “Heh, that’s a neat tri—WOAH!” Tentacles of water wrap around you mid-sentence, yanking you up to her face and hugging you into her ample belly. Fear or drowning kicks in, and you thrash to get free, to not sink into this mystical creature’s liquid form…

…For all of one second. You aren’t drawn under. In fact, you don’t sink at all. The water’s surface has become viscous, like a water bed, keeping you safe. You blush and look up at the elemental hugging you tight. She quirks a brow and makes a bubbling sound like a giggle.

Silly thing, you think I’d hurt you? You imagine her saying.

“Oh, forgot to mention: that elemental is a hugger.” Morgan supplies, too late. “She can’t help herself, especially when I have guests! Sometimes I shrink myself and hug it out with her. Last time I had some humans over we played with them together!”

Another bubbling giggle, and the elemental starts rocking you around, not letting the hug go—heck, she hugs even tighter! Your head is shoved between her aquatic breasts, and she gives an amused chuckle. You blush again: this water-lady wasn’t much for modesty! And apparently she liked playing with humans as much as Morgan did…

As if reading your mind—maybe she COULD do that; you didn’t know what these magic creatures could do—the water being’s expression becomes mischievous. She just got an idea…!
11133221113211113.title: Playful...maybe even flirtatious?!

choices: On Morgan's snout...she spots you immediately!
111332211132111132.content:
"Uh, what are you planning Miss Elemen--URK!" You try to get an answer from the aquatic creature, but she shifts her grip so you're tucked under her arm like a rucksack. Waggling her brow at you, she extends her free arm theatrically. Water flows across her form toward the limb, pooling at the end and forming into something...

A tennis racket?

You blink. Why would a creature made of water need a tennis racket? It couldn't be a gift: it was scaled to someone of her fifty-foot height, so you were too small to even hold it. Maybe she wanted to play?

"You want to play tennis, Miss Elemental?"

She nods, grinning.
But she still held you tight against her side, and that grin lingered on you too long to be comfortable. Red flags started going up in your head...

You gulp and decide to tempt fate. "Um, I don't suppose you could make me a racket? Or a ball?"

She gives a bubbling giggle...and points the giant racket at you.
Oh cutie, YOU'RE the ball! No need for a racket, you imagine her saying. Instantly you start squirming to escape, but her grip...and being squished into her plump form...made it futile. You did manage to tickle the elemental, though.

"Uh, Morgan? She's gonna use me as a tennis ball! Little help?!"
No answer. Morgan's shower and screeching song drowned you out as the elemental turned the faucet back on and lifted you up for a serve, aiming at the stream of water.

"Morgan, this isn't funny! I don't want to be sports equipment! I don't even like tennis, I prefer baseball! Morgan, stop the elemental please! Drink her or something!" You keep pleading, but your frantic calls go unheard as you're thrown straight up with a yelp, high enough to clear the top of the sink and see Morgan's silhouette behind the shower curtain before gravity reclaims you and you fall back towards the elemental, waiting with racket in hand/tentacle.

Through the fear, you glare at the aquatic spirit.
"I hope you get pumped full of fluoride, you big fat--"

Whack!

The watery racket smacks you like a giant flyswatter (though painlessly; she wasn't trying to hurt you), rocketing you across the sink and into the cascade coming from the faucet--and bounce off it back at her, the water suddenly viscous and rubber-like. It seemed the elemental could control water that wasn't part of her form.

And thus began the impromptu game of tennis, the elemental whacking you back and forth across the sink. With surprising skill, too: she was always right where you would be, timing her shots perfectly.

It might have been impressive if YOU weren't forced to be her tennis ball. "MORGAN, HELP!" Whack! Topspin. "This is--" Whack! Slice. "--Not funny! She isn't--" Whack! Backspin. "--being a good host!"

But your pleas go unanswered. Morgan still scrubbed herself down, cheerily butchering whatever song she was singing. At least this couldn't get worse...

You fly back towards the elemental as she winds up a truly epic lob shot. The racket smacks into you harder than ever before--but still not enough to hurt--and sends you straight into the water. It bends back, more than any other shot you've endured...

And sends you rocketing clear out of the sink, over the shocked elemental's head! You jeer at her, happy to be free...until you realize you're flying right toward the shower!

Morgan, of course, remains oblivious.

Screaming, your arc peaks over the bar and you get an awe-inspiring look at the colossal, beautiful, and very naked form of Morgan.
You can't help but grin: the titanic werehippo really was a bombshell!

When gravity claims you a second later and you fall towards the shower, you suddenly remember how dangerous bathing with such a giantess could be.

Maybe being used as a tennis ball wasn't so bad after all...

Flailing and tumbling for a long moment, the roar of the shower and clouds of steam clouding your senses, you finally make impact--making a splash and knocking yourself senseless.

When you recover, you realize you've landed....
111332211132111132.title: Out of The Frying Pan, Into The...Water

choices: The water starts drawing you towards the drain!
The elemental tries to save you!
1113322111321111321.content:
The roar of the shower and splashing water wake you from your daze within moments...you'd landed face-first in the shower! Ignoring how you REALLY shouldn't have survived a fall like that, you feel your ears turn red--you'd fell right next to Morgan, while she was naked! Mumbling an apology, you roll onto your back.

...And feel your heart leap into your throat.
You'd landed behind Morgan, giving you a VERY good look at her impossibly huge rump. But that wasn't what made you freeze.

You'd thought you had a good sense of how big Morgan really was:1500 feet--the size of a small mountain. Titanic, sure; but you figured you'd gotten a good sense of the size difference by now.

You were wrong. VERY wrong.

When you'd first seen the werehippo giantess, you'd been confused and frazzled from appearing in this world. Combine that with almost getting stepped on, tangled in her hair and nearly drowning, her sitting on you, and THEN all the magical shenanigans...the first impression hadn't really registered.

But now, after you'd gotten to know her? Knew what and who she was? Staring up at the pachydermic giantess, her form filling your view like the moon falling from the sky; her every movement rippling across her and swatting through the torrent of water coming from the shower...you finally realize just how utterly gigantic a height of 1500 feet really was. You weren't a human next to a mountain, you were next to a GODDESS. The rivulets of water streaming down her form were a hundred waterfalls; each a current strong enough to sweep you away.

You lay there, flat on your back, staring up at the living mountain in awe as the water comes down in sheets; how long you aren't sure. You eventually regain your senses and try to call out, hoping Morgan will somehow hear you...

But before you can speak....
1113322111321111321.title: Behind Morgan, in the bathtub!

11133221113211113211.content:
Slowly, you can't tell if because she's sluggish due to her severe obesity or that your brain is thinking faster than the world is spinning, Morgan descends. You're fully aware that the Lovecraftian-sized fortress of pachyderm booty is approaching at a rate and path that would land its most pressurized spot point-blank at your mortal coil, devoid of any of the safety nets from prior; she's not going to show only enough restraint to remain playful, nor does her bathtub follow the same pseudo-sort of reality that enabled your survival in the ring. She's going to allow the full weight of her body to fall onto you with the precise force that gravity can allow, ignorant to the needs and weakness of the human body.

Such a nonchalant at would reduce an entire human village and its inhabitants to their utter destruction and pandemonium, but for you, to see a creature who can't be that massive that can't move about at such a size doesn't register the concept of cause-and-effect. A violinist in your head strings away a tearjerking cover of Nearer My God to Thee, and with the foresight of certain impending doom comes an odd sense of closure. Peace, even. Of all the possibilities the multiverse in all its infinity could apply, the countless realms that could've killed you by being slaughtered by cannibals, burned at the stake by witch-hunters, or even just ne beaten in the streets by a gang of ponies you'd gotten on the wrong side of, dying under the rear of a hippo titaness was certainly not one of the least noble ways to die. A sad accident after a night of fun, in fact, not like those who were sick and alone in a hospital, nor trapped and afraid in some collapsing cave.

The underside of Morgan's naked rear hits the surface of the water, the oncoming black globes separated from your form by a roaring tsunami. The water, too, curls over itself in slow motion, the bends in the funneling tidal wall carved and crisp in the natural glassy bends and flows that give a flowing stream its beauty. What hits you first is a cooling mist that gives your last moments a composing chill that takes your skin like a hand taking yours, speaking in some mute, kind voice that everything would be alright. Your arms extend and your head rears in that cliched pose of an action star throwing himself to the jaws of oblivion, eyes shutting to ensure your last sight of the world is Morgan's backside...

...but what hits you first is the barrage of water. That cleansing cold becomes an icy sting, and in a jolt your eyes bug out towards the matter at hand, the towering, black, corpulent matter that was obliviously barreling your way, and with that comes a sort of spiritual revelation.

YOU'RE ABOUT TO DIE, YOU MORON.

"MORGA....MMMF!"

…..


Morgan milks the act of wriggling her rump into the end of her bathtub, delighted by a certain cracking noise as its ceramic is impacted by the width of her hips. Both by the satisfaction of filling further into her tub's breaking point and the water striking her skin, she blows out a blissful whistle and leans back, stretching out her feet as her hands lay back to feel the two black hide-covered globes that the bathtub is struggling to contain, butt blubber pooling over the rim like a pair of water filled balloons squeezed in the center, forcing its mass upwards.

A few more bellyfuls of hamburgers for it to smash apart, to need a widening again. Heh...to think it was once a hassle whenever her bathtub needed widening. When her magic-fueled cravings made it a dread to step on the scale and see another third of the previous weighing added on. Just some pesky conditioning from society to worry about her figure and live out in the open like some diva that took a few good looks in the mirror of her ballooning frame to kill it off in favor a new outlook on life.

Besides, when she had a knew friend to share it with, who was she to turn back now?

Speaking of...yeah, him. She observed his sink to see his playmate over there, waving her aquatic arms over her head. Morgan grinned, hoping she wasn't giving him to intense of a date now, but the elemental wasn't performing a one-human juggling match per her expectations. The water-siren's eyes were wild with worry as she flapped about in gestures for Morgan to rise and see the severity of what'd been committed, spinning with grace and vigour a lengthy vocalization of her part in the human's likely demise.

"BLUB BLUBLUB BLUB BLUBLUBLUB BLUB BLUB BLUB!!! BLUB BLUBLUBLUB BLUB BLUB BLUB BLUBLUBLUBLUB!!!"

Morgan pursed her lips, calculating the water-lady's drowned words, but settled on leaning back in contentment. "Hug time later. It's bathtime."


Choice 1: You don;t die, but Morgan discovers that you're not in the sink and gets up to search, carrying you with!

Choice 2: Actually, Morgan does know where you are. You're not gonna die...but she's not gonna be boring about it, either.

Choice 3: RIP, you.
11133221113211113211.title: Morgan obliviously sits on you!

choices: Play it safe: sleep on the bedside table
Actually, you WOULD like to sleep on her booty...
111332211132111132112.content:
Poolside chairs are softer than you'd thought.

That was what went through your mind as Morgan's naked booty crashed down upon your pathetic human form like a thousand mountains.

When she'd first sat on you, she'd dropped you onto a poolside chair. You'd always hated the things, finding the elastic bands that stretched over the metal frame uncomfortable. Having a giant hippo woman sit on you in one only reinforced that--the bands stretched so taut they'd had as much pressure as Morgan's meteoric backside.

But now? Squashed against cold, unforgiving porcelain? The pool chair seemed like heaven. It at least contoured to Morgan's weight, and didn't crush you back like the bathtub did. And at least then Morgan KNEW you were under her rump and was holding back...wait.

Why was she laughing?

====

Morgan chortles, unable to contain herself. It was time to have some fun. She looked down at her rear, not seeing the human but enjoying the moment.

"Oh, it must have been so frightening for you: seeing my naked rear about to flatten you, being helpless to stop it...but as long as you keep it safe a little domination never hurt anyone," she purrs, wiggling her titanic cheeks. Her heart races as she feels the grinding motion flattening him even further and drag him along the porcelain floor, his struggles pleasantly tickling her rump. She sighs in bliss, leaning her head back and closing her eyes. "Mmm...I know I said I'd gotten this out of my system, and to be honest I thought I did. But I've never sat on humans bare-bottomed before. And when you just happened to land right behind me--well, how could I resist? You understand, don't you?"

====

She knew.

Morgan KNEW you'd been launched into the shower.

She'd just sat on you on purpose!

You're caught between anger, shock...and relief. Looks like you WOULDN'T die by werehippo booty. (Not that your predicament was pleasant--the hard bathtub was far less forgiving than the elastic pool chair she'd dropped you onto the first time she sat on you. The water was cold, too!)

With an open mouth of hippo-rump, you can barely manage to ask her to just get off you already...

====

A muffled, barely-audible grumble is her only answer. Morgan giggles, fanning herself. She wasn't lying about that part: she'd loved sitting on humans since she was a kid. It was silly, funny, and let her know just how huge she really was; what being 1500 feet tall REALLY meant. And with adulthood came..."adult desires". Sitting on a human naked had been a tempting taboo of hers once she became an adult; one that just wouldn't be worth it in her warped reality. Oh sure, she could find plenty of eager volunteers--some humans were into that sort of thing--but she'd never put the word out: it seemed cheap, crass.

But now? A human she'd come to like, even burned out her magic for a while just to have some fun; even beat her at her own game? He was perfect to try out her fancy on. And since he hadn't expected it...so much the better. She bit her lip, enjoying his thrashing. "Keep it up, that feels lovely! Don't worry, I'm almost finished..." She wiggled down once more, and got back to showering...sitting down, of course.

====

"Almost finished" turns out to mean "I'll take as long as I want."

Morgan adds a quick bounce or twist of her rear to every part of her shower routine: lathering shampoo, scrubbing herself down, rinsing off the soap; everything. You're squished, flattened and pulverized under her hulk; splashed anew into the water at every bounce and getting a fresh coat of soap. Sometimes she leans back to put more weight on you before sitting up again, making sure you never adjust to the pressure or weight. And she took her sweet time with everything, enjoying every minute of your entrapment beneath her naked backside. Your impromptu pachydermic dominatrix shows little mercy beyond what's safe to keep from turning you into a pancake.

But...you never feel in danger. You're battered and everything hurts, but you NEVER feel like your bones will break or that you'll suffocate. (The bounces free you JUST long enough to get a fresh gasp of air...convenient). You even start to enjoy it a little, like the fist match in the illusory wrestling ring.

The world suddenly tilts, and you're lifted off the unforgiving bathtub--plastered to Morgan's mountain-sized cheek as she leans to the side. Peeling your head back from the entrapping blubber, you wince at the bright light and look over your shoulder.

The elemental peeks over the rim of the sink, wincing in sympathy at your plight. She bubbles something that sounds like I'm sorry! before retreating from view. Your gaze is drawn to the gold-rimmed mirror above the sink....

Where you see a tiny, barely-visible speck on the vast black expanse of Morgan's ass. You looked like a flea.

"Yup, that's you!" Morgan twitters, making sure you see her reflection's wink. She gives her rump a slap, creating a shockwave that jostles you. "Now then, before we finish..."

Your warning of what's to come is displayed on the mirror. Morgan lathers up a body sponge with some luxuriously-scented soap, then brings it around to scrub her left cheek--the one you're plastered to. A tidal wave of soap washes over you, the sponge pressing you down and slapping against your form with every scrub. It smells wonderful, but the slick soap offers no hope of slipping off. A gush of water rinses off the foam...

And then, you see Morgan wink at you in the mirror; before her rear descends again. The world goes dark as she sits on you anew---and the weight suddenly crushes down as she leans on you, to wash the other cheek.

Soon, with a final thud, she sits up again. The water turns off, its thunderous symphony leaving an ear-ringing silence in its absence.

"That. Was. Amazing." Morgan breathes, shaking the water from her hair. "Finally; I've always wanted to do that..." She gives one last wiggle for good measure, then stands up to peel you off her booty. It takes a good minute to peel you off, since you're so flattened. You're dangled in front of her smirking face.

"Well. I'd say that's enough fun for one night."

====

After a round of apologies from the elemental and Morgan, you towel off and get into a set of human-sized pajamas Morgan has handy. (Turns out she keeps some human clothes around in case she finds one. They're still in their store packaging, so they're fresh.)

Cupping you in her hands, Morgan carries you to her bedroom. "Don't worry, after that lovely bit of fun I think I've had my fill of sitting on humans for a while. You won't have to fear getting flattened under my bum for a long time." She winks. "Of course, if you ask, I'll be happy to oblige."

You snort a laugh. "No thanks. I've had my fill of the Butt of Doom."

"Hmph. Spoilsport."

With surprising grace for such a huge being, Morgan holds you in one hand as she pulls back the covers and sits on the bed, covering herself again. "One last thing: do you want to sleep on my bedside table? I have a sleeping bag ready for you? Or...well, sleep with me?"

You tilt your head, blushing. "Hold up. Do you mean..."

"LITERALLY sleep with me, Mr. Hormones," Morgan quips, rolling her eyes. "And nothing else. We just met, silly! I have a sitting-on-humans kink, but I have SOME standards. Anyway, you can sleep on my nice soft belly...or my chest, if you feel brave enough."

"What, no sleeping on your stomach so I can use your butt as a pillow?"

"Like I said, I've had my fill of that for now."

You yawn, feeling the tiring day crash down on you. It was time to sleep...

The question was, where?

No. OH NO!

The giant hippo woman was giving you an unmistakably hungry look, even licking her lips for good measure. Ignoring your cries of protest, she rudely shoves you towards her snout, sniffing at you as if savoring a fresh pastry. "Mmmm...yep, you'll be a tasty one. Not even the chlorine can mask you unappetizing. You should be proud."
A massive wet tongue snakes out from her lips and slaps against you. It's like getting hit across your whole body by a wet ten-foot think rubber hose.

She sighs in horrifying bliss. "Oh, you are a special case! Normally I'd play with you a bit, but for a treat like YOU? I'll skip the foreplay."
Your world tumbles as she suddenly lifts you high into the air, letting you slip just enough to dangle upside down by a leg. Then the hippo woman opens her maw wide to accept you.

It's like a giant pit filled with teeth, leading to the abyss of her throat.
You're too stunned to beg, or even scream.

Licking her lips whilst wearing a smirk, the man-eating hippo goddess gives one final tease.

"Happy trails."

With that, she drops you screaming into her maw. The second you land on her massive tongue, her jaws snap shut before you even bounce. Immediately you hear a cataclysmic "Mmmmm!" all around you; the werehippo apparently finding you delicious. Her tongue suddenly flails beneath you, tossing you about the dark confines of her mouth. You're slammed against her cheeks and drenched in saliva, getting knocked ass over teakettle as she plays with you in her mouth. More than once you nearly drown in her saliva; have to dodge her Boulder-sized teeth as she "teasingly" tries to chew you up. It goes one for what feels like forever.

All the while you can hear her moaning in delight at your flavor, giggling at her utter domination of a tiny human...and, faintly, thundering footsteps as she walks to who knows where.

After a spell of being battered and beaten by her playing, you're left barely conscious and utterly exhausted. Most of your clothes were gone, having been pulled off and sent down into the pit of her stomach. You don't even protest when she presses you against the roof of her mouth, like she was trying to get the last bit of flavor out of a piece of candy.

"Ahhh...sho gud..." you hear the werehippo sigh, her voice slurred with you in her mouth. Her footsteps has also stopped. "Well, guesh I'm dom whiff you."

And with that, she swallows you whole, sending you screaming down her throat and into her waiting stomach.

======

In her luxurious penthouse suite, the werehippo massaged at the bulge in her throat with a single hand, tracing her snack's path all the way down until the human vanished into her belly. Smiling in utter bliss she licked her lips one last time, getting the last traces of the human's flavor.

"Delicious," she said.


**But...were you truly digested?**

"What is that?" she asks. "A sand flea on my butt?" You gulp and climb even faster as the enormous sphinx tries to chase after her own tail. However, because of her own fat body, she can't really reach it very well and runs so rapidly that you fall screaming off of her body into the sand.

Occasionally there's a rift and humans from other worlds cross into our world. Not that we mind, but personally, I think the humans of Xenodu taste a whole lot better."

"Please don't eat me." You say. Mirage lets out a yawn. "Please don't eat me," she says mockingly. "You don't get it. Humans in this world are basically stuck in the middle ages so good luck finding any defense. You're just lucky you ran into a sphinx. "W-What do you mean Ms. Mirage."

Mirage lowers her head and smiles, showing sharp teeth as big as buildings. "As a sphinx, I'm bound to ask you a riddle, that's tradition for humans. If you answer incorrectly, well..." Mirage rubs her bloated tummy to give you a good idea for what would happen if you failed and you hoped you wouldn't end up in her belly. "But I must warn you, the fatter the sphinx, the harder it is for a human to answer her riddles, and I am quite fat. But of course, it gets boring after a while, so I'll make it interesting."

11223121.content:
It was tough pondering the answer to an age old riddle while you had a big huge chubby sphinx cockily smiling down at you, waiting for you to slip up so she can gobble you down! Fortunately, you were pretty good with thinking outside the box. You'd HAVE to be if you thought climbing up the tail of a huge hungry sphinx was a better idea than letting her fly off!
Thinking outside the box, the riddle itself was actually so complicated, that it was super obvious! The riddle wasnt necessarily describing something metaphorical, it was being VERY literal. As in LITERALLY the words themselves. Thrice at 'thE End of timE' and 'thE End of spacE', see it at least once at 'any old placE', appears only twice in 'thE bEginning', and one of two links between 'firE and icE'.

"WELL?!" Mirage was pretending to be impatient while still giving you that smirk of hers, "are you gonna answer or what? If you need more time, I can give you plenty of it in my belly!"

You couldnt wait to wipe the smirk off the sphinx's face.
"Are you the letter E?" you asked.

There was silence. Absolute silence. Even Mirage's tail stopped wagging so the swooshing sounds it made were gone too! Her eyes widened a tiny bit. She did her best to keep a straight face, but being so ginormous as she was, it wasnt that difficult to spot the cracks in her facade!

"Wait," the sphinx finally spoke, "what did you say? I couldnt hear that." Bullshit she couldnt!
"I said are you the letter E?" you repeated, "JEEZ!!"

You friggin jumped back when her claws dug deep into the sand, possibly destroying centuries worth of settled earth hidden deep beneath it! Mirage had finally stopped smirking at you. She was clearly at a loss for words! Did you just trump the great mighty big-boned big-boobed and huge-assed sphinx?

"D...did I get it right?" you asked her, "am I your mate now? ...Er... does that technically mean we're married? Would there be like a traditional wedding ceremony involved? ...W...would one of us have to grow or shrink if we... you know?" All these questions and more will be answered... hellifIknow.

"Uh... um.... er...." she was honestly sweating! Guess she's not use to losing huh? ".....b....BEST TWO OUT OF THREE!!"

"WHAT?!" you screamed and immediately regretted it!
"Y... you heard me, human!" Mirage was clearly butthurt. And that was a lot of butt to hurt. "by my pride as a sphinx, I hereby make this game of riddles best of three!"
"Y...you cant do that!" you object, forgetting your place, "I already answered your riddle, you said-"
"I make the rules of this game, human!" the sphinx looked down her big chubby nose at you, "you will play by MY rules. If you have a problem with them, I can always send you to my... complaint department!" she tapped on her wide tummy. Cheating bitch. But you werent in any place to argue. So you had to abide by your predator's rules or be eaten by her!

You growled, "Fine. Two out of three. What's the next riddle?"

"There are two sisters: one gives birth to the other and she, in turn, gives birth to the first. Who are the two sisters?"
That was a tricky one. It took quite a bit of thinking, but luckily you remember taking a mythology class and learning about some of the riddles that the mythical sphinx said to Oedipus. This wasnt the more well-known riddle (spoiler, the answer to the other is MAN), but you vaguely remember this tricky gem.

"Day and Night," was your answer. The great sphinx bit her lip. Again, this huge behemoth of beauty and gluttony was beaten at her own game! Her wings began to twitch along with her eyebrows, causing uncontrolled gusts of wind!

"Next riddle!!" Mirage broke her own rule again, "A cowboy rode into town on Friday he stayed for 3 days and left on Friday. How was that possible?" That riddle was completely out of place for someone of Greek (not Egyptian, GREEK!) myth to be asking! Too bad for her, cuz your dad used to tell that one!
"The horse's name is Friday!" was your answer.

"Urggh!!" Mirage gritted her teeth, sweat dripped down her forehead, her rump shaking nervously causing minor earthquakes, her tail began to flail about, "Uh... um... A young boy and his father are in a car accident. The father dies at the scene. The boy is transported to the hospital, taken immediately into surgery... but the surgeon steps out of the operating room and says, 'I can't operate on this boy - he is my son!' WHO IS THE DAMN SURGEON?!"
"His mom," she wasnt even trying.
"H-H-How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?!"
"A woodchuck could chuck as much wood as it could if a woodchuck could chuck wood."
Oh dear. Was she on the verge of crying?!
"I-I-If a t-tree f...falls in the forest... a-a-and n-no one's there to hear it, d-does it make a sound?"
"How can a sound exist if no one's there to hear it?"
"W-W-WHAT IS YOUR FAVORITE COLOR?!"
"Red."

Her jaw dropped in disbelief and she twitched, possibly trying to fight back the tears in her eyes! Did she run out of riddles? The answer to that question was GET THE HELL OUT OF THE WAY!!

You hauled ass, giving the sobbing sphinx ample space as she dropped to the ground in shame! You rode the huge tidal wave of sand that rippled past you and quite possibly destroyed a nearby unlucky village! When the aftershock ended, you turned to see Mirage's head lying in the sand, possibly out of shame and self pity.

"Unbelievable..." she sobbed to herself, "after spending so many years conjuring up so many impossible riddles... a tiny mere human from another world just up and solves them all right then and there? M...my legacy... my pride... *Sniff* destroyed in a single minute!" Geez, solving her silly riddles caused THIS much damage to her?!
"M...Mirage?"

"I'm a joke... a failure!" she sniffed, "*SNIFF!* a disgrace to my kind! I've let my pride down... I'm sorry, mom.... I couldnt follow in your paw-steps!!" Man, were you beginning to feel bad. Sure she was gonna eat you and she did try to screw you over in her own game, but wow. You didnt really think she'd be THIS hurt about failing to outriddle you!

"Um... d-does this mean you're my mate now?"

"Do whatever you wish with me," Mirage's eyes lowered to the sand, unable to look at you, "use me to your heart's content. I dont care anymore. I'm YOUR inferior, now." Sheesh. But anything you wish, she says.

She was clearly beaten and broken. You had the best opportunity to flee safely, but you were the victor and you had one sad colossal prize in front of you. And let's face it, her ginormous body did interest you.
However, there's that part of you nagging about why you shouldnt abuse a sad broken woman/giant sphinx like her. It was your male conscience telling you to comfort that poor crying giantess.
You waited patiently while the devil on your left shoulder argued with the angel on your right.

It was time to make a decision.
