"You'd think men would stop cheating on you if you keep it up with these harsh punishments. Remember that guy you ate? He's still in the psychiatric ward." You shiver at that thought. Another hazard was that men could very easily be swallowed by monster women. Bafflingly, it was extremely survivable but no less traumatizing.

Sally then blows on her finger. "Enough about ex-boyfriends," says your gargoyle fiancée. "The movie is starting." The movie starts and you can see Godzilla and you lean in front as Sally and Hera have their eyes glued to the set. But you then lose your footing on the gargoyle's shoulder and you yell as you slip down and bounce off of Sally's breasts and roll down the rolls on her stomach before falling into the bowl of popcorn. Each kernel was the size of a large truck to you and you stand atop a piece. "This is not good." You mutter. You hear roaring and it's clear the movie starts.

But then you see a shadow coming over and a hand reaching into the popcorn. "Oh no." You mutter. Who does the hand belong to?
15521222212.title: The Hundred-Eyed Roommate

choices: Yes. She Swallows a Rope to Fish You Out
No. You Have to Wait Until the End of the Movie
155212222121.content:
The hand was a tealish green hand that ended in four sharp clawed fingers, meaning that it was Sally's hand. Your gargoyle fiancée grabs a handful of popcorn and the movement of her hand shakes the bowl and causes you to fall off the piece of popcorn you're on and into the handful the titanic gargoyle grabs. "Oh no." You mutter. The gargoyle drags her handful of popcorn out of the bowl and up towards her face as she and Hera watch the movie.

Hera and Sally watches the Godzilla movie as the former stuffs her face with gummy bears. "Is that Godzilla?" asks Sally. "No," says Hera. "That's Anguirus. He sort of reminds me of your sister's chihuahua. To think that creatures at such a small size were considered giant destructive beasts." Sally lets out a laugh. "Now kaiju like that might as well be exotic lap dogs." As Sally is laughing, the gargoyle giantess brings her handful of popcorn with you trapped between two kernels coming into her mouth. "Sally!" you yell. "Down here! It's me! Buck! I'm in the popcorn."

Unfortunately, Sally's eyes are glued on the movie and she shovels the handful of buttery popcorn into her mouth with you inside. You hold on tight to a kernel but slip on the butt and scream as her fangs come down and nearly flatten you as they grind up the boulder-sized pieces of corn. "Sally!" you yell. "I'm in your mouth again! Spit out the popcorn! Don't eat me!" But the roars of the kaiju in the movie as well as the grinding noises of your fiancée's teeth drowns out your scheming and Sally munches on the popcorn as the butter drips over her mouth.

You try to stand on Sally's tongue hoping that she'll taste you and realize what's going on. This isn't the first time that you were in Sally's mouth. It was actually very common these days for monster girls to carry their human spouses in their mouths and extremely common for the men to be swallowed accidentally or intentionally. Because for some reason the giantesses couldn't digest humans, some men actually enjoyed it. Not you though. But as you stand on Sally's tongue, you slip on the butter and yell as you fall into her esophagus with an avalanche of popcorn.

You land in Sally's stomach with a splash and are sent 10s of feet below the stomach acids and are forced to swim rapidly to the top or you'd drown. You gasp for breath as you surface and have to climb up a piece of donut that Sally ate for breakfast. You let out a groan. "I can't believe it," you grumble. "My fiancée ate me. Now I'm going to miss the movie. Well, it's lucky for me that Sally's such an obese pig. I definitely won't starve. I just hope she realizes that I'm not on her shoulder." You let out a sigh and bite off of a piece of the donut.

Does your gargoyle lover notice she ate you immediately?
155212222121.title: Sally's Mouth

1552122222.content:
Several centuries ago, meteors struck the Earth and transformed the planet, making Earth much larger than Jupiter and returning magic to the world. The meteor caused the entire female population of Earth to be permanently transformed. All women were turned into various monsters from all forms of mythology and folklore. These monsters were also transformed into giants. The smallest females in the world were 1500ft tall. However, they could still have children with human men small as grains of rice to them. Male offspring would be human, while female offspring would be titans. Because of that, you were still living with your mother until you finally tie the knot and get married. Of course, that wasn’t going to take long. At that moment, you were in your room getting your tuxedo ready. Today was the big day and you needed to look your best.

Speaking of which, you heard a knock at the wall that led to your room. “Heath,” says your mother. “Are you ready yet? You can’t be late for your own wedding.” “Don’t worry, Mom,” you say. “I’m almost ready. No way I’m going to mess up my wedding to Elisa.” You feel vibrations as your mother is coming forward. Your mom was in fact a particularly large monster. She was a 5000ft tall behemoth, a type of mythological creature resembling a hippopotamus with dinosaur-like skin and a long tail like a cedar tree. She had reddish-purple skin and long white hair that reached down to her enormous and bulky rear. She had blue eyes, or rather eye. Your mother had lost an eye in a fight years ago and had to wear an eyepatch. Seeing as her son was getting married, she was wearing a black cocktail dress and gold earrings with pink lipstick. She lowers her hand in order for you to step onto one of her flabby fingers to climb up. “Up you go.”

Your mother holds you in her hand and you can see her smile as a slight tear appeared out of her one good eye. “My little man,” she says. “Finally getting married.” “Calm down, Mom. You still have to give me away to the bride.” Your mom lets out a snort before she leaves the house with you in her palm. “You do realize this means you belong to Elisa now? Remember, ever since the meteors struck, the alleged lesser sex has run the world.” “Kinda hard to argue with somebody 300 times bigger than you, or in your case, Mom, 1000 times.” Your Mom snorts. “That’s precisely why I approved this marriage. Of all the girls that showed interest in you, Elisa was the only one as big as me. No way was a twig going to marry my baby. I must say that you chose a winner. I can’t believe your fiancée turned out to be a college professor. At least that’s one less thing I need to worry about. Well, I better prepare to give you away, Heath. Good luck. You’re Elisa’s problem now.” “Ha-ha.” You laugh sarcastically.

At the church, everything is in place. Elisa is waiting for you. Your bride was a 5000ft tall minotaur. Specifically, Elisa resembled a cape buffalo with thick black fur and bluish raven-colored hair. She had an obese stomach and enormous booty that was almost as big as your mom’s but with muscular arms and legs. She was waiting for you in a wedding dress that was obviously too tight on the bovine beauty’s big body. Elisa’s relatives were mostly females, specifically, minotaurs like her of different breeds of cattle. Elisa’s mother was a large brown-furred bison woman with a large Afro that appeared to be graying and was just as heavily built as her daughter. She was wearing a powder blue dress and white gloves. She was carrying every male guest at the wedding in her hands. Since the meteors struck and mutated all women, it became a tradition for the male wedding guests to observe the ceremony in the palms of the bride’s mother.

Elisa was waiting for you and smiling as her tail was wagging. “You better brace yourself, Elisa,” says Elisa’s best woman. “You’re gonna have to deal with Susan Spade as a mother-in-law.” Elisa’s best woman was an enormous and very pear-shaped gargoyle woman with aqua-colored skin and pale greenish blonde hair worn in a spiky style. She was also wearing a pair of thin glasses along with her bridesmaid outfit. “Come on, Aqua,” said Elisa. “Sure, Heath’s mother may be a pain at times but she’s a behemoth, it’s to be expected. They’re as territorial as actually hippos.” Elisa turned to see her mother smiling at her and fighting back tears right before Elisa herself looked down at her finger to see the ring you bought her. It was definitely no picnic to buy wedding rings in this day for men. Especially since the wedding ring that would fit around a girl’s finger was the size of an arena.

At that moment, the door opened up and your mother came in walking you down the aisle. You smile at Elisa but your mom looks nervous as the minister is showing up. You really hope that everything goes off without a hitch.
1552122222.title: The Big Day

15521222222.content:
It was yet another Tuesday at the parlor you worked at. You had arrived bright and early when you felt tremors and looked up to see your employer Beth. Beth was a 4500ft dark green-skinned and red-striped werelizard with bright red triceratops-like horns, long black hair, long claws and jagged teeth. Like most women you knew, she was quite plump, especially below the waist. The titanic reptile looks down on you with her bright red eyes before speaking. “Well,” she says. “The first one here as always. Get on.” Beth holds out the big toe on her left foot and you climb on the lizard giantess’s long and sharp toenail before she stomps off to the front of the salon. “Don’t forget,” says the titanic lizard. “Mrs. Colt is coming in to get her shoes hammered in.” “Yes, Beth. I got it.” Beth ran a beauty parlor and your main job was working on women’s feet, whether it be working on toenails, massaging soles or in the case of centaurs like Mrs. Colt, hammering in horseshoes. You didn’t mind. You were one of the men in society who accepted such a position.

This was how life was in 2780. Centuries ago, magic meteors struck the Earth, causing it to change drastically. The Earth expanded in size as magical energy returned to the planet, creating a world where the Dark ages of magic combined with the scientific age of the future. However, the most dramatic effect of this spell was that half the human race was transformed. All women were transformed into colossal versions of the monsters of mythology from around the world. And from then on, every male baby born would be a normal sized human while every female baby a great beast. The smallest giantesses stood at least 1500ft. In the new world, the standards of beauty changed drastically in regards to these titans. If you were a giantess, the bigger you were, the more beautiful you were.

Needless to say, women were in charge of the world and every country and major corporation was ruled by a titaness. Your mother was no exception. The fact was your mother was a fat cat; both because she was a CEO of a successful TV studio but also because she was a titanic 5000ft tall albino sphinx who would weigh as much as a sumo wrestler if she was normal-sized. She had pale cream-white fur and hair and bright red eyes. She didn’t look half bad for a woman her age and in spite of her massive weight, her wings were big enough to allow her to fly. Being a sphinx, rather than walking on two legs, she walked on all fours like an animal. At that moment, she was pacing around her office rather troubled as your father rode on her head behind her ear.

“Take it easy, Lydia,” your father says. “The meeting went well. What are you worried about.” Your mother let out a sigh. “James,” says your mom. “Don’t you think it’s irksome that works all day at women’s feet and yet he hasn’t asked one of them out even once?” Your mother starts to growl in frustration as your dad gives a look of worry. “Lydia, it’s not a big deal.” Your mom then glares at your dad as she gives a slight meow. “Claire is already married and she’s younger than James.” Your mother was of course talking about your sister who while three years younger than you was married first. She resembled her mother, except she had longer hair and gold-colored fur. You and Claire got along fine but you didn’t care much for her husband. For that matter, neither did your dad. “Of course, Claire got married first. She’s your heir. Money and power are very attractive. Uh, that isn’t to say Claire isn’t attractive, Dear.” Your mother just lets out a sigh. “If Tyler doesn’t find himself a girl but soon, I’m going to take matters into my own paws.

Your mom plops her enormous rear behind her desk as she grumbles to herself. “It’s a shame when the parent is less picky than the child. How am I supposed to give our son away to a nice girl if he isn’t even trying.” “Why don’t you try and hook him up with one of your employees?” “You think I haven’t tried that? The only one that was interested was Sasha Scales, the night guard.” “What’s wrong with Sasha?” “She’s a naga! Tyler has no interest in girls that don’t have feet.” “You’re right. He’s used to being at women’s feet with the type of job he has. Why don’t we try a mail order bride.” “Are you kidding? There hasn’t been such a thing as a mail order bride since the meteors hit. Nowadays it’s all about mail order grooms.” “My aren’t we extra negative today.”

Suddenly, there was a buzz from your mother’s secretary. “Mrs. Catseye,” she says. “There’s somebody here to see you about the show that’s replacing Diagon Abbey.” “Send him in, Lucy,” says your mom. “Dang. That’s gonna be a tough act to follow. We’re going to need something really good to stay on top.” Your dad rolls his eyes. “At least we’re doing better with that channel with that teen superhero team.” Your mom just gives a gag. “How a show that terrible stays on the air is beyond me.” It was there another giantess entered your mom’s office. She was a titanic 3000ft high and very fat and chest heavy werebat with bright silver fur and long red hair as well as a tuft of fur on her chest that was bright red and in the shape of a bat. Her clawed hands were attached to her wings and she was completely naked except for a pair of glasses (some monsters were able to get away with not wearing clothes, provided they had fur to cover themselves up).

The bat woman gave a confident smile as she flapped up to your mother. “Lydia Catseye I presume? I am Barbara Blood and boy do I have a good idea for a reality TV show for Channel 5.” “Reality TV?” asks your mother with a scoff. “Ugh.” Ms. Blood gives a shrieking laugh. “Oh, don’t be like that. This one’s actually good. I call it Starlight Hearts.” "And what may I ask is the premise?" asks your mom as your father scratches her behind the ear and makes her purr. “Lower.” Ms. Blood gives a smirk. “My idea is a matchmaking show. Every month, we select 1 eligible bachelor and then select 3 eligible monsters. He dates all 3 for the duration of the month until he picks 1 of the 3 to go steady with. I’ve already set up a website where these girls can apply.” Ms. Blood opens up her computer and shows files of dozens of young monster girls that catch your mom’s attention. Your dad gives a whistle. “I can’t believe the number of people rely on dating websites.

However, your mom gets an idea from the pitch for the show and scratches her double chin. “Sounds interesting, Ms. Blood. You know, I might just give your show a chance.” Ms. Blood lets out a shrieking laugh. “You won’t regret this, Mrs. Catseye.” But then your mother holds up a paw. “On one condition; the first bachelor on the show will be my son.” Ms. Blood looks at your mom in confusion. “Your son?” Your dad gives an uneasy look. “Lydia, what are you doing?!” Your mom then covers your dad with her paw before speaking. “My son is at the age when he should be married but I’m having no luck finding him a wife. All day long he works on their feet and he can’t ask one girl out on his own!” Ms. Blood nods her head. “I see. And what is your son’s preference?” Your mom gives a purr. “Larger girls, like yours truly of course. But they have to have big feet to go with their big bodies.” Barbara gives a smile. “You won’t be disappointed, Mrs. Catseye.” Your mom gives a purr as your dad gives a look of worry.”

At that time, you were busy working on Mrs. Colt’s feet and the centaur giantess was busy reading the newspaper as you were hammering in the last horseshoe. Suddenly, your cellphone rang and this caused you to hammer too hard and the centaur giantess screamed in pain. You answer the phone and see that you have a text from your mother. “Guess Who’s Got Three Potential Wives Waiting for Him.” You let out a groan. “Aw, Mom.” Beth overheard the scream and went to check up on you. “What happened?” she asked. “Nothing, Beth,” you say. “Just my mom meddling in my life again." Beth lets out a sigh and then rolls her eyes. "Just get back to work. And try not to give the customers arthritis."

"Will do, boss." You say nervously. You then give a groan. “This is not going to be easy.”
15521222222.title: The Dating Game

155212222221.content:
That night at dinner, your sister and her husband were joining you and your parents and your sphinx mother and sister wasted no time in devouring filleted fish the size of trains. You weren’t touching your own food and it made Claire stare at you. “Tyler?” she asks. “Is something the matter?” You don’t answer and the golden sphinx has to tap you on the head slightly. “Hey, big brother, I’m speaking to you.” Your brother-in-law, Phillip, just gives a scoff. “Leave him alone, Claire. If he wants to waste Emily’s hard work on tonight’s dinner, let him.” “Shut up, Phillip.” You say. Claire then turns to your parents and your mom lets out a sigh. “Tyler, don’t be like that. You might just meet a nice girl.” “Who knows?” asks your dad. “Maybe you’ll end up with a big beautiful sphinx like I did.” Your mother licks your father after hearing that comment.

“You’re asking me to go on one of your station’s game shows to get hooked up with a girl I don’t know.” “Well, it’s your own fault,” says Claire with a laugh. “You’re the one who isn’t really... proactive about finding a... mate.” Your sister’s train of thought slips as Phillip uses a laser pointer to distract her as she swats at the red dot on the table. “Why didn’t you just ask Beth or one of your customers out, Tyler?” “1) Many of our customers are already married. 2) Beth has a girlfriend and 3) This is a terrible idea! Mom, everybody knows you’re the CEO of Channel High 5. You’re basically inviting a bunch of gold diggers to take their pick at your other offspring.” Phillip gives you a glare and holds up his fork in a threatening gesture. He knew the very reason you didn’t like him that much. You suspected he only married Claire for your mom’s money. Not that he could try anything against your mom or Claire given he like all men was less than a breath mint to both his wife and mother-in-law.

“Tyler,” says your mom. “Be reasonable. This could be your last shot at getting a girlfriend. Think about this real hard.” You bite your lip but you knew there was no use arguing with a 5000ft tall albino sphinx who also happened to be your mother. “Fine, Mom. I’ll go through with it.” Your mother smiles and bends over to give you a kiss, painting your entire body in her lipstick in the process. Your dad then climbs into her ear as she drinks a glass of wine. “I just hope our future daughter-in-law isn’t a hydra. Those multi-headed girls give me the creeps.” Lydia gives a scoff. “James, you worry too much. That must be where our son gets it. I already spoke with Barbara and she’s the manager of a hostess who will throw our son like a bouquet to get him a bride.” Your mother then eats another fish with one gulp and begins to gag because she ate it too fast. “Emily,” she calls out to your maid. “Could you be a dear and please bring me more water.” Claire lowers her head and purrs. “Good luck, Tyler,” your younger much huger sister says. “Just wait until you get a taste of marital bliss.” Claire then lower her jaw for Phillip to climb into her mouth and then closed it as they proceed to tongue kiss. You shiver at the thought of what your sister and brother-in-law are doing right in front of you.

Elsewhere, Barbara Blood, the vampire bat giantess who pitched Starlight Hearts to your mother was meeting with another giantess. She was a chubby Frankenstein’s monster girl with three miss-matched eyes, long pink hair reaching down to her large butt and patchwork skin that was different shades of gray. She also had bolts sticking out of her shoulders and wrists and was wearing a patchwork bikini with heart designs on it. “Good news, Veronica,” says Barbara. “Starlight Hearts is about to be an actual thing.” The Frankenstein’s monster giantess put on her makeup before she gave a smirk. “Good,” she says. “Now the world gets to see Veronica Valentine on live TV. Who’s the lucky man I’m setting up on a date first.” Barbara bites her lip. “Well, that’s the thing. Mrs. Catseye wants your first customer to be her son. His name is Tyler.” Veronica’s three eyes all but pop out of her head. “Tyler?” she asks. “Hold on, I think I know somebody with that name. Tyler, Tyler. OMG, that’s the guy at Beth’s Boutique. That toe cleaner is Lydia Catseye’s son? Who would’ve guessed.” “Please take this seriously,” says Barbara with a hint of annoyance in her voice. “If we jump through this hoop, Starlight Hearts will be the biggest show on High 5. Do not blow this.” Veronica gave a yawn. “Oh please,” said the pretentious patchwork lady. “I’ve got this.” Barbara just bit her lip and rolled her eyes.

- - - - - -

The next day, you walked into work and heard loud stomping. Beth was glaring down at you and you look in shock. “What are you doing here!?” yells the lizard giantess. “Your mom called me and told me that you were taking the day off.” “Huh?” you ask. “This is the first I’ve... ugh!” The lizardess grabs you in her claws before she lifts you up to her face and shrieks. “What are you doing standing around here? You’re needed at the studio. They’re shooting the first episode of Starlight Hearts in an hour!” “Wait!? So sudden. But the show was only approved yester...” Beth squeezes you and then storms out to take you to the studio. “Oh good grief,” you moan to yourself. “Just what has Mom gotten me into?”

Before you can say another word, Beth reaches the studio and Barbara flies down and snatches you up. Barbara then stares down at you with a smirk that makes you very afraid. “You, little man. Are about to make me the most successful agent in L.A.” You give a gulp as the show is just about to start.
155212222221.title: Starlight Hearts

1552122222211.content:
It isn’t long until the first episode of Starlight Hearts is ready to air. The men on the catwalk adjust the lights as the audience gathers around in their seats. Barbara is very pleased with the turnout right before she sees your mother taking her VIP seat to watch the first episode of Starlight Hearts as it airs. “You won’t be disappointed, Mrs. Catseye. I guarantee it.” Your mom gives a scoff. “I couldn’t care less about the ratings. I just want to see what kind of girls you’ll be trying to pair Tyler with.” Barbara nods her head just as a heart-shaped pink light shines on the stage and out walks Veronica with a smile on her face.

“Hello, America!” yells Veronica as she stomps her large foot. “I am Veronica Valentine and you are watching the first episode of Starlight Hearts! Yayzies!” The crowd cheers and several men watching from the monster women’s purses focus on Veronica and the skimpy outfit she’s wearing. If they only knew what she was like off the camera. “Every month,” says Veronica. “We’ll present you with an eligible young man and 3 carefully selected monsters from a list of online applicants will get their chance to play to be the steady girlfriend to the tiny eye candy of the month. Now, let’s meet who these gorgeous gals are fighting for this month!”

As more lights turned on, one of them focused on you inside of a pink cage decorated with hearts. You let out a sigh as you hear the crowd roaring and Veronica gives a smile before picking up the cage, giving you a good view of her stitched up face. You swear that her mouth would be bigger if certain stitches came undone. “This eligible bachelor is Tyler Catseye, a beautician with a thing for women’s feet and another plus, is the son of studio owner, Lydia Catseye. Meow! And what better way to get the ball rolling by finding our leader the perfect daughter-in-law. F-W-I, Big Mommy says sonny boy likes big gals with big feet. So we narrowed our search down to three lucky ladies who we’ll be following for the next month as they court Tyler and we’ll know by the end of the month which final girl will win.” You grunt as Veronica shakes the cage. “And without further adieu,” says the Frankenstein monster giantess. “Let’s introduce our three lucky bachelorettes.” Not only are you nervous but your mom is watching the first episode and stuffing her face with shrimp as she bites her claws and your dad holds on tight to her ear.

That was when the first contestant came in. You look in shock. From the looks of it, she was a 4000ft tall baku, a yokai resembling a fanged tapir. She had bright copper skin with a white spot on her back. She was very obese with long golden blonde hair and a pair of pink glasses. As you sat in your cage, you couldn’t help but notice her enormous hooves. Each toenail was big enough for you to build a house on. The baku woman just smiled as she looked at you. “Tyler,” says Veronica. “Meet our first bachelorette, Maya Ruiz. This beautiful baku hails from New Mexico and before that, actual Mexico, and works as an agent for the Worldquest Travel Agency while in her spare time building model planes.” You could almost swear that Maya was smirking as she looked at you, as if there was more on her mind than just love. However, you were paying more attention to her lovely hooves. “Ahem,” grunts Maya in a Latin accent. “My eyes are up here.”

Before you could respond, the second contestant came in. The second giantess to come forward was just as tall and fat as Maya. She was a gigantic turquoise-skinned kappa with short rose-colored hair and a gray shell. She resembled a sea turtle. The first thing you noticed about her was her webbed flippers. Those weren’t the type of feet you were used to. The kappa girl flipped her hair and showed her sultry eyes as she stared at you and you even had to clutch your chest. “Bachelorette Numero Deux,” says Veronique. “Is Shelby Aoyama, a kappa who’s been in L.A. from Tokyo for 1 year. Been out of college for 6 years and yet she’s just recently turned 18. Has a degree in marine biology and works at a laboratory that’s part of the national seashore. Her favorite pastime when she’s not monitoring the activity of the ocean blue; surfing!” Shelby then walks up towards you and leans down to get a good look at you. Your jaw drops. This goddess with perfect flippers was a college graduate and she was barely older than a teenager? Were they insane giving her a chance to date you. Shelby just winks at you. “My,” she says. “Aren’t you so cute, I could just sit on you.” As she says this, she wiggles her large butt cheeks that appear to be too big for her shell to even contain.

 “And now!” yells Veronica. “Bachelorette No. 3!” The last giantess to walk out was just like Maya and Shelby; 4000ft tall and fat. This young woman was an enormous violet red-skinned gargoyle with long black hair reaching down to her massive rear. She had large leather wings with bright violet membranes and six large horns on her forehead. But what you were interested in was this gargoyle women’s long and sharp bird-like talons. “Bonjour.” Says the gargoyle giantess in a French accent as she raises one of her goddess-like talons. “Our last bachelorette is Gabrielle Delacroix. Gabby if you’re nice. Born and raised in Paris France as a peinture extraordinaire whose naturalistic and surreal works of art hang in the collections of the most influential titanesses in Europe. And to sweeten the deal, she doesn’t speak a word of English.” Gabby stares at you and then blows a kiss.

Maya, Shelby and Gabby walk up as Veronica gives a smile. “1 of these lucky 3 will win a brand new husband. Will it end with You could not believe the three girls you got stuck with. You had a month’s time to decide if you wanted to marry a girl with talons, a girl with flippers or a girl with hooves. Maya, Shelby and Gabby were looking down at you with lust as you backed up in your cage.

As all this was going on, your mother was watching the display and wagging her tail. Your father sitting between her pointed ears and biting his nails just as Veronica is about to continue. “Now,” says the Frankenstein giantess. “All we have to do is decide which of these lovely ladies will take this bite-sized hunk out first.” Veronica then gestured to a table with three cards carefully placed face down. “Beneath these cards, there is a triangle, a square and a star. Whoever draws the star will get the first turn. The square will grant the second turn and whoever gets the triangle will get every third turn. Now, without further adieu, let’s light up some hearts!”  You look out as Maya the tapir titaness, Shelby the colossal kappa and Gabby the ginormous gargoyle walk up to draw their cards. This month will give you the chance to know all three giantesses. But this draw will decide who gets to date you first. The audience cheers and watches while your mother focuses on the three girls. “Those three are the best girls Barbara could find?” asked your mother to yourself. Your dad then blows into the titanic sphinx’s ear. "It's starting."

Now who exactly will be your first date for the month?
1552122222211.title: Extreme Matchmaker

155212222222.content:
The year is 2780...The world changed. I don't know how to describe it because this is the only world I've known. We don't necessarily know how it happened. What we do know is that it all began with a meteor-impact. Somehow this impact caused the future and the past to collide. Technology seemed to be made obsolete as a powerful force that we only took to describing as "Magic" had been released from the Meteorite.

The Magic seemed to pour out of the rock, like radiation. We at first tried to harness it to use for our own purposes. But we soon found out that the Magic had some rather poisonous side effects. It was a slow process but all the women in the world began to change. They exhibited strange mutations, and before we could find a cure, most women had completely changed and were no longer human anymore...they were monsters. Specifically the women had all changed into strange anthropomorphs of mythological creatures from fairytales and legends. And that's not all...
The radiation caused the women to grow larger as well. It got to the point where the monster women could no longer be contained; we couldn't cure them anyway. This plague had spread throughout all of the planet. The entire female population changed, becoming towering monsters. But the men were oddly immune to it all and remained unaffected. I heard there were experiments to test what caused this; if maybe estrogen was the catalyst and testosterone could be the cure.

It got worse from there; the new gigantic monster women were an odd epidemic to deal with. Ordinarily I'm sure certain people would enjoy looking up and seeing a giant woman standing above them. Not so much in this world. You see, the larger a woman in this world becomes...the more monstrous she becomes. Before long, the entire female population was made up of feral giantesses. They would go completely wild after breaking loose from the quarantined area. Cities were devastated in the attacks to stop them. What's worse is that they would often fight each other for territory. Civilization was left in ruins and the problem apparently wasn't going away.

That was centuries ago. The government was certain that mankind would face extinction; considering that all of the females in the world suddenly turned into giant feral monsters and the men were so tiny compared to them, it's not like we had opportunities for breeding...But we soon found out that wasn't the case.

Mankind had to shelter itself into tiny pockets and corners of the world to get out of sight of the monster women. But every so often the women would come and raid the colonies, scooping up handfuls of men at a time. At first we thought they were going to eat them; after all we are considered their favorite snack. But the truth is a bit more disturbing. Every so often, the giantesses will go into heat - so to speak. The men they abduct are taken back to their lairs where they try to mate with them. And as disturbing as it sounds...they succeed...

Somehow or another, men are still essential to these giant bitches for reproduction and it's still possible. The man isn't really expected to survive the ordeal - after all can you imagine having sex with something the size of a sky scrapper? A female still has a chance of producing a male or female offspring; only the females that are born...well they grow up to be like their mothers in almost every way. But males are still born human. It's how our numbers stay relatively sustainable; otherwise they'd have chomped or fucked us to death by now...

Fortunately, the maternal instincts for the monster women are incredibly strong and never seem to run out; which is lucky to say that they don't eat whatever male offspring they produce. In fact they're actually more maternal with their sons than their daughters. Hell some of them keep their human offspring inside of them for safe-keeping; almost like preventing them from being born. I should know; I was told that I spent the first few years of my life inside my mom before she was killed by a rival.

I joined up with a colony that exists in a nice peaceful valley far away from monster territory. It's how I learned about all the fucked up stuff in this world; course I didn't know how fucked up it was until I learned that there was once a time before this. For me this is just life...For me, I live a meager existence, working wherever and with whoever I can to make a life for myself...all the while wondering of what will happen when I find myself in some girl's shadow...

There's talk about the colony of developing weapons and technology to combat the huge broads. I honestly think its hopeless. We don't stand a chance; this problem not only isn't going away but it's also getting worse. It was somewhat doable centuries ago back when the ladies were only about 200 feet tall...The last recorded sighting of what was considered a "small" giantess had her in at about 1500 feet tall...
We've gone from being insects to microbes in their eyes...

But hell...the world is doomed anyway; we used to be able to hear them from far away. We could hear that they would struggle with each other; punching and trying to break each other, fighting for dominance. But its been years since we've heard anything outside our borders. Some of us think that they've managed to wipe themselves out...
And unfortunately for the sausage fest I find myself apart of...that only means its only a matter of time before we're all gone, snuffed out like a candle in the wind...

The question now is; what to do about it?
155212222222.title: Attack on Giantess

1552122222222.content:
Ever since that uneventful day, ever since that strange meteor struck the Earth, nothing...and literally NOTHING has EVER been the same. For one thing, all females around the world changed into giant towering anthropomorphic monsters from various fairytales, myths and legends. However, what truly made this day stand out was, not how it affect the opposite sex, but how it affected YOU. You were near the site when the asteroid collided with our planet...and you were there when humanity tried to harness the "magical energy" from that chunk of space rock, plus witnessing the changes and the following events that have happened soon afterward. You have recently come to terms how life has changed in the future, still there are days when you hope that these events will go away and wake up in a dream. But enough now, it is time to talk about you and your "abilities", so to speak, that you have "gained" from that day which changed everything and everyone you knew.
         Your first memory is hazy, but you were going out for a walk one night, when you noticed a bright light shining from the sky (you can't remember why you were outside in the first place, because you weren't very active in the past. As a matter of fact, you don't know much about your past at all.) At first, you thought it was a shooting star and stopped to make a wish. Unfortunately, you should have kept walking or running, since that "star" kept falling straight toward you at an enormous speed. You eventually did start running, but it wasn't enough, because the meteor soon crashed on the ground and you were quite a ways from the impact zone. However, you still felt that collision and feeling the ground breaking apart when it struck down. Before you got struck down on your head and passing out.
         Afterwards, probably about maybe... you don't know a few weeks or years (you lost track when you were out cold.) You wake up in some sort of super secret government bunker, like the ones in a movie. It had everything from people in white lab coats and security personnel to computers hooked up to fancy gadgets and gizmos. Except for one thing, a "MOW MOW MOW" sound was going off, red lights were blinking and filling the facility periodically, plus all the staff that worked there were all MALE; young and old, dark skinned and light skinned; tall and short; muscular, skinny and even some men that were pudgy at best, were all running around screaming, "It has escaped...ESCAPED!" "KILL THE B****, RIGHT NOW!" "WE ARE ALL GOING TO DIE!" etc. You even saw a security member grab a handgun and started shooting some lab members..but they didn't flinch or protest, after the final scientist was shot in the head, the officer with the gun in hand was about to do himself in, when all of a sudden...a giant claw like that of a lion or some other giant jungle cat, reached down and picked the man up. You sort of remember that the guy looked like he was in his thirties, pretty muscular, and he had dark skin (again you don't know.) The one feature that you can clearly remember is not the colour of his eyes or anything about his face, but what STATE it was in...FEAR, HELPLESSNESS and everything else associated with those feelings and/or thoughts. At that moment, you felt...YOU FELT.....ANGER......HATRED and more than anything to help him right now. Fortunately, out of nowhere, a bolt of energy came surging out of your body and destroyed the console that held you prisoner, you then ran straight toward the hapless officer but was too late. He was gone and nowhere to be found. You fell on my knees in defeat, which didn't last long, since you soon started running out of the facility, your prison, the nightmare you woke up in, only to enter another one.
         The past following years and you do mean years were absolutely crazy. They were spent hiding, scavenging, and trying to help any male human you could find to some haven or sanctuary, all the while you were gaining more powerful, extravagant abilities. You are also pretty sure you're immortal or seem to age at an INCREDIBLE slow pace, because it was the year 2780. Not only that, but you were incredibly strong, durable, fast, phase through solid matter and even shoot out some energy shots out of your hands or "lasers" from your eyes, plus many, many more yet to come you think to yourself.
         Despite this "gift" and your occasional assistance from time to time, the giant behemoth monster "women" appear to be winning, hell, some of them were put in positions of power of government and were even running companies or businesses around the world. If any other human saw this, they would most likely give up and surrender (which they did), except for YOU. This is motivating you to try even harder, you are tired of your "kind" being used for breeding, livestock and many other things. Yes you are aware, that there are male humans who are happy with their new lives and are married to some of these giantesses. That doesn't matter to you though, you are still going to find a way to take down these things (perhaps the ones that are most troublesome) and help anyone who requires assistance. You were there when this all began and are aware that the old government ARE responsible for these creatures. However, to you they are thieves who stole your past life and have changed the world for better (or most likely) the worst. Plus you need to do right now, so this could be your purpose, a self-proposed "destiny" to work for, because if you don't do it, who else will? Maybe you'll even find some allies to help you along the way and "fight" back against this new and (supposedly) cruel, dangerous world you are now residing in.
1552122222222.title: I AM OMEGA (MAN)

info.brief_description: Trapped in a land filled with giant monster girls.
info.description:
In this story, you will be thrown into a world filled with giant monster girls, some friendly, some horny, and some hungry. Will you make it out alive?

Adding chapters is encouraged.

Basic Rules:
1: No dying until at least Chapter 150 of a story.
2: Any Monster Girls allowed. No giantess humans. And no shrinking of monster girls or growth of character.
3: Soft vore, unbirth, breast, and oral vore allowed.
4: Try using proper spelling. Anything unreadable or lazy will be removed.
5: Be descriptive. No one liners or bland content.
6: Try and stay in second person.
7: On first few chapters, leave options open to let others work in their own stories.
8: Keep underage content to a minimum.
